name: FlagsTest
description: Unit tests for the Flags class, focusing on various flag operations and state checks.

test_cases.name: testClear
test_cases.description: Tests the clear functionality of the Flags class, ensuring all flags are reset to 0.

test_cases.name: testClone
test_cases.description: Tests the clone functionality of the Flags class.

test_cases.name: testEqualsObject
test_cases.description: Tests the equals method of the Flags class.

test_cases.name: testGetFlags
test_cases.description: Tests the getFlags method of the Flags class, ensuring it returns the correct flag value.

test_cases.name: testHashCode
test_cases.description: Tests the hashCode method of the Flags class, ensuring it returns the correct hash code.

test_cases.name: testIsOnIsFalseWhenNotAllFlagsInArgumentAreOn
test_cases.description: Tests the isOn method of the Flags class, ensuring it returns false when not all flags in the argument are on.

test_cases.name: testIsOnIsTrueWhenHighOrderBitIsSetAndQueried
test_cases.description: Tests the isOn method of the Flags class, ensuring it returns true when the high-order bit is set and queried.

test_cases.name: testIsOnOff
test_cases.description: Tests the turnOn, isOn, and isOff methods of the Flags class, ensuring they correctly manage flag states.

test_cases.name: testToString
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of the Flags class, ensuring it returns the correct string representation of the flags.

test_cases.name: testTurnOff
test_cases.description: Tests the turnOff method of the Flags class.

test_cases.name: testTurnOffAll
test_cases.description: Tests the turnOffAll method of the Flags class, ensuring all flags are reset to 0.

test_cases.name: testTurnOnAll
test_cases.description: Tests the turnOnAll method of the Flags class, ensuring all flags are set.

test_cases.name: testTurnOnOff
test_cases.description: Tests the turnOnOff method of the Flags class.
